channel.title: Windows7 on Hugo Hacker Theme

item.title: HOW TO SETUP REMOTE ACCESS TO FOOBAR 2000 MUSIC PLAYER
item.description: Most of you have favorite PC audio player of their own, in my case it is [Foobar2000]. In Android 6 times there was a wonderful software called [Foobar 2000 Controller]. It was made to control audio player remotely from your smartphone in a convenient way. For some reason i recall it today and decided to record installing process for future use. Guys from [Hydrogen Audio] forum helped me out in some questions and pointed me to the right direction.
